page.title: 08HEATON PARK - EVENTS
page.content:
In 1982{Pope John Paul II}came to Great Britain. We were very lucky because he came to celebrate Mass in Heaton Park. We remember his visit by a monument which is situated in the park. The monument is in the place where the altar was standing during Mass.
His Holiness John Paul II came to Heaton Park on Monday 31st May 1982. He left Speke Airport, Liverpool, and landed next to our school,{St. {Peter's R.C. High School.}The Pope arrived at approximately 8.10 a.m. Mass began at 8.35 a.m. It ended at 11.00 a.m. The Holy Father returned to Nazareth House at 11.40 a.m., and departed for York at 1.05 p.m.
Martina Walsh, 1S
